name: Ground Zero Hero PROLOGUE
description:
It's post-apocalyptic fun times in this 'bullet heaven' action roguelite!
Destroy screen-filling hordes of mutated wildlife, absorb their radioactive guts and become an overpowered freak of the wasteland!

KEY FEATURES

  • Unlock an ever growing list of powerful mutations and permanent upgrades
  • Experiment with unique combinations of powers to craft your ultimate freak
  • Survive the radiated desert, scrounging for candy while battling the mutated fauna
  • Discover unique interactive elements scattered across the wasteland, including fallout shelters for saving your game mid-run
  • A dynamic soundtrack that changes based on gameplay
  • Vampires. Actual vampires
